00033 #include "WM_types.h"

00045 void ED_operatortypes_metaball(void)
00046 {
00047     WM_operatortype_append(MBALL_OT_delete_metaelems);
00048     WM_operatortype_append(MBALL_OT_duplicate_metaelems);
00049     
00050     WM_operatortype_append(MBALL_OT_hide_metaelems);
00051     WM_operatortype_append(MBALL_OT_reveal_metaelems);
00052     
00053     WM_operatortype_append(MBALL_OT_select_all);
00054     WM_operatortype_append(MBALL_OT_select_random_metaelems);
00055 }
00056 
00057 void ED_keymap_metaball(wmKeyConfig *keyconf)
00058 {
00059     wmKeyMap *keymap;
00060     wmKeyMapItem *kmi;
00061     
00062     keymap = WM_keymap_find(keyconf, "Metaball", 0, 0);
00063     keymap->poll = ED_operator_editmball;
00064 
00065     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "OBJECT_OT_metaball_add", AKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0);
00066     
00067     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MBALL_OT_reveal_metaelems", HKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ALT, 0);
00068     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MBALL_OT_hide_metaelems", HKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00069     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "unselected", FALSE);
00070     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MBALL_OT_hide_metaelems", HKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0);
00071     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "unselected", TRUE);
00072     
00073     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MBALL_OT_delete_metaelems", XKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00074     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MBALL_OT_delete_metaelems", DELKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00075     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MBALL_OT_duplicate_metaelems", DKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0);
00076     
00077     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MBALL_OT_select_all", AKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00078         RNA_enum_set(kmi->ptr, "action", SEL_TOGGLE);
00079     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MBALL_OT_select_all", IKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
00080         RNA_enum_set(kmi->ptr, "action", SEL_INVERT);
00081 
00082     ED_object_generic_keymap(keyconf, keymap, 3);
00083 }
